name: DC 280/DC 220 - Ceccotti Collezioni
description: Designed by Vincenzo De Cotiis in 2007, the DC 220 and DC 280 sofas are distinguished by their expansive surfaces and minimalist lines. These pieces reinterpret classic styles with a modern aesthetic, bringing a timeless elegance. Available in fabric, leather, or pure leather finishes, these materials add an element of sophistication, making these sofas the centerpiece of any living room. They share a collection with the DC 80/60 and DC 100/85/150 models.
